SessionStart.prompt_content:
SESSION CONTINUITY CHECK

Before proceeding with any game development tasks:

1. Check if .claude/project-status.md exists in the project
2. If it exists, read it and summarize the current state to the user
3. Ask if they want to continue from the last position or start fresh

This ensures seamless continuation across sessions.

Format: "Project [Name] is at [Phase] ([X]% complete). Last action: [task]. Next: [task]. Continue from here?"
